code.name: APC_INDEX_MISMATCH
code.description: Indicates that there is a mismatch in the APC state index.
code.p1: The address of the system call.
code.p2: The value of the following: Thread->ApcStateIndex << 8 | Previous ApcStateIndex
code.p4: The value of the previous KernelApcDisable

code.name: IRQL_NOT_LESS_OR_EQUAL
code.description: Indicates that kernel-mode code accessed paged memory at DISPATCH_LEVEL or above.

code.name: MAXIMUM_WAIT_OBJECTS_EXCEEDED
code.description: Indicates that the current thread exceeded the permitted number of wait objects.

code.name: SPIN_LOCK_ALREADY_OWNED
code.description: Indicates that a request for a spin lock was initiated when the spin lock was already owned.

code.name: TRAP_CAUSE_UNKNOWN
code.description: Indicates that an unknown exception has occurred.
code.p3: The enabled and asserted status bits.
